tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE carbon_emissions (
  emission_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  emission_date DATE NOT NULL,
  emission_source VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  emission_amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
  emission_offset BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE CarbonEmissions (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    emission_type VARCHAR(255),
    emission_amount DECIMAL(10,2),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    blockchain_id UUID
);

CREATE TABLE Offsets (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    offset_type VARCHAR(255),
    offset_amount DECIMAL(10,2),
    offset_source VARCHAR(255),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    blockchain_id UUID
);

CREATE TABLE EmissionsOffsetsLink (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    emission_id INT,
    offset_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    blockchain_id UUID
);

CREATE TABLE EmissionOffsets (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    offset_type VARCHAR(255),
    offset_date DATE,
    offset_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    related_emission_id INT REFERENCES CarbonEmissions(id)
);
